briefTitle: Implementing Systematic Distress Screening in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Implementing Systematic Distress Screening in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participants Offered and Screened for Distress
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed with initial breast cancer, any stage, any histology type
* Kaiser Permanente member for at least 100 days during study period

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
